alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:23PM EDT until July 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TOLLAND AND NORTHEASTERN HARTFORD COUNTIES... At 723 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Windsor, or near Windsor, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Enfield, Vernon, Windsor, Mansfield, South Windsor, Bloomfield, Suffield, Ellington, Tolland, Windsor Locks, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, East Windsor, Willington and East Granby. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
